title: Honoring Doug Ellin upon the occasion of being inducted into the John F. Kennedy High School Hall of Fame
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  honoring  Doug Ellin upon the occasion of being
inducted into the John F. Kennedy High School Hall of Fame

WHEREAS, It is the practice of this Legislative Body to take note of and
publicly acknowledge individuals of remarkable integrity  and  character
who  have  inspired  and brought pride to our majestic Empire State with
their strong contributions to the community and model citizenship; and
  WHEREAS, Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its  long-
standing traditions, this Legislative Body is justly proud to honor Doug
Ellin  upon the occasion of being inducted into the John F. Kennedy High
School Hall of Fame; to celebrate this auspicious event, a Hall of  Fame
Induction  Ceremony  and Dinner was held at the high school on Saturday,
November 13, 2010; and
  WHEREAS, Doug Ellin graduated in 1986 from John F. Kennedy High School
which is located in the Bellmore-Merrick Central High  School  District;
and
  WHEREAS,  Four years later, he graduated from Tulane University; since
then, he has become an acclaimed  comic,  actor,  writer,  producer  and
director; and
  WHEREAS,  His credits include Creator, Head Writer and Producer of the
hit television show "Entourage" as well as Writer, Actor and Director of
"Life with Bonnie", "Kissing a Fool", "Phat Beach", and "The  Pitch  and
The Waiter"; and
  WHEREAS,  This  outstanding man is a creative artist, a philanthropist
and a recognized leader in the field of television; and
  WHEREAS, It is the sense of this Legislative Body that  when  individ-
uals  of  such  noble aims and accomplishments are brought to our atten-
tion, they should be celebrated and recognized by all  the  citizens  of
this great Empire State; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED,  That  this  Legislative  Body pause in its deliberations to
honor Doug Ellin upon the occasion of being inducted into  the  John  F.
Kennedy High School Hall of Fame; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Doug Ellin.
